main_definition: Used refers to something that has been previously owned, employed or utilized by someone else before being acquired or adopted.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Employed as a verb for indicating prior possession or use of an object
meanings_and_examples.example: I used this old book to learn English.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Designating the act of taking advantage of something previously owned by another person
meanings_and_examples.example: She was skilled at using any opportunity that came her way.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to objects, tools or equipment that are not new but have been previously used and hence might show wear and tear
meanings_and_examples.example: He bought a used car from the dealership.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In informal contexts, indicating familiarity with something due to past experience
meanings_and_examples.example: As someone who has been used to public speaking, she felt comfortable on stage.
